entity.name: COVID-19: Latest news updates from around the world
entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with the latest information and updates on COVID-19 from experts, journalists, health authorities and other trusted sources from around the world. For more on COVID-19, visit: twitter.com/explore/tabs/covid-19

text: @jidesanwoolu @LSMOH @NCDCgov Great Kudos to @followlasg for the efforts at active case finding of #COVID19 in the state. I'll be sharing some useful tips that can help Lagosians as well as Nigerians in reducing community transmission of COVID-19 on @tvcnewsng at 7:00am and 8:00am today April 20th. Join us! https://t.co/5YUpai4Cb0
